mapper.update: update PT_TaskSaleInvoice set VehicleID_Jump=#{jumpVehicle}, NumberOfSignings = #{receiptNum}, SigningTime = #{signingTime}, ReceiptMan = #{receiptPeople}, SaleFileImage = #{sign}, updownmark=0, upStatus=1 where ID = #{invoiceId}
mapper.select:
select PersonalCode, PersonalName from VM_PersonalInfo where RecStatus = 1 and compid = #{compid}
and PersonalName like '%' + #{driverName} + '%'

select tsi.ID, tsi.VehicleID, tsi.PersonalCode, vm.PersonalName, tsi.VehiceNumber, tp.Placing, tp.TaskId, tp.eppCode, tp.builderCode, tp.slump, tsi.ThreeProduceNum, tsi.TaWeight, tsi.GrWeight, tsi.NetWeight, tsi.SendTime, tsi.totalNum, tsi.NumberOfSignings, tsi.SaleNum, e.EPPName, b.BuilderName, tp.StgId, ps.PI_TypeName placeStyleName, tsi.upStatus, tsi.InvoiceType, vs.PI_TypeName VehicleStatusName, it.PI_TypeName invoiceTypeName, tsi.VehicleID_Jump JumpVehicleID, tsi.ReceiptMan receiptMan, tsi.SaleFileImage saleFileImage, tp.Attribute as attribute from PT_TaskSaleInvoice tsi left join PT_TaskPlan tp on tsi.compid = tp.compid and tsi.TaskId = tp.TaskId left join DD_PublicInfo ps on ps.PI_Class = 24 and ps.PI_Values = tp.PlaceStyle and tsi.compid = ps.compid left join SM_EPPInfo e on tp.EPPCode = e.EPPCode and e.compid = tsi.compid left join SM_BuilderInfo b on tp.BuilderCode = b.BuilderCode and b.compid = tsi.compid left join DD_PublicInfo vs on vs.PI_Class = 22 and tsi.VehicleStatus = vs.PI_Values and tsi.compid = vs.compid left join DD_PublicInfo it on it.PI_Class = 51 and tsi.InvoiceType = it.PI_Values and tsi.compid = it.compid left join VM_PersonalInfo vm on tsi.PersonalCode = vm.PersonalCode and tsi.compid = vm.compid left join VM_VehicleWeight vw on tsi.compid = vw.compid and tsi.taskid = vw.taskid left join DD_PublicInfo it2 on it2.PI_Class = 53 and vw.WeightType = it2.PI_Values and tsi.compid = it2.compid where tsi.id = #{id} and tsi.PersonalCode = #{driverCode} and tsi.InvoiceType != 6 and tsi.InvoiceType not in('1','2') and tsi.recStatus = 1
